decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - This is a semi-detached dwellinghouse on the southern side of Manor Way with a staggered rear building line and a garage located to the rear of the dwellinghouse. The property is neither listed nor located in a Conservation Area.
Condition : 2 - The proposal is to construct a single storey rear extension. It would have a width of 1.6m and would be contained within the curtilage of the dwellinghouse.
Condition : 3 - The maximum height of the single storey rear extension would be 3.63 metres and the height to the eaves would be 2.77 metres
Condition : 4 - The depth of the proposed extension would be 1.37 metres beyond the rear wall of the original dwellinghouse and would not extend beyond a wall which fronts a highway.

Condition : 5 - The proposed enlargement of the dwellinghouse would fall within the development permitted by Class A of Schedule 2, Part 1 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 as amended by the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (Amendment) (No.2) (England) Order 2008 subject to the materials used in any exterior work being of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse.
description: CERTIFICATE OF LAWFUL PROPOSED DEVELOPMENT: SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION
